trans-unit.source: Make a separate commit for each changed formula with git add and git commit.
trans-unit.target: 使用 git add 和 git commit 为每个更改的公式进行单独的提交。

trans-unit.source: language-homebrew-formula adds highlighting and diff support (with the language-diff plugin).
trans-unit.target: language-homebrew-formula添加了突出显示和diff支持（使用language-diff插件）。

trans-unit.source: formulae.brew.sh has a documented JSON API which provides access to the brew info --json=v1 output without needing access to Homebrew.

trans-unit.source: Fork the Homebrew/brew repository on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: 在GitHub上分叉Homebrew / brew存储库。

trans-unit.source: Create a new release on GitHub based on the new tag.

trans-unit.source: jrnl is an example of a formula that does this well. The end result means the user doesn’t have to use pip or Python and can just run jrnl.
trans-unit.target: jrnl 是一个很好地执行此公式的示例。最终结果意味着用户不必使用 pip 或Python，只需运行 jrnl 即可。

trans-unit.source: pdftohtml provides an example of a serious conflict, where both formula ship an identically-named binary that is essential to functionality, so a conflicts_with is preferable.
trans-unit.target: pdftohtml 提供了一个严重的冲突，其中两个式运送的相同名称的二进制也就是功能性必需的，因此一个的示例 conflicts_with 是优选的。

trans-unit.source: jrnl is an example of a formula that does this well. The end result means the user doesn’t have to use pip or Python and can just run jrnl.
trans-unit.target: jrnl 是一个很好地执行此公式的示例。最终结果意味着用户不必使用 pip 或Python，只需运行 jrnl 即可。

trans-unit.source: pdftohtml provides an example of a serious conflict, where both formula ship an identically-named binary that is essential to functionality, so a conflicts_with is preferable.
trans-unit.target: pdftohtml 提供了一个严重的冲突，其中两个式运送的相同名称的二进制也就是功能性必需的，因此一个的示例 conflicts_with 是优选的。

trans-unit.source: Fork the Homebrew/homebrew-core repository on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: 在GitHub上分叉Homebrew / homebrew-core存储库。

trans-unit.source: InstantClientTap/instantclient: A tap for Oracle Instant Client. The packages need to be downloaded manually.
trans-unit.target: InstantClientTap / instantclient：单击Oracle Instant Client。软件包需要手动下载。

trans-unit.source: brewsci/bio: Bioinformatics formulae.
trans-unit.target: brewsci / bio：生物信息学公式。

trans-unit.source: davidchall/hep: High energy physics formulae.
trans-unit.target: davidchall / hep：高能物理公式。

trans-unit.source: denji/nginx: A tap for NGINX modules, intended for its nginx-full formula which includes more module options.
trans-unit.target: denji / nginx：用于NGINX模块的水龙头，用于其 nginx-full 公式，其中包括更多模块选项。

trans-unit.source: dunn/emacs: A tap for Emacs packages.
trans-unit.target: dunn / emacs：Emacs软件包的水龙头。

trans-unit.source: homebrew-mode provides syntax highlighting for inline patches as well as a number of helper functions for editing formula files.
trans-unit.target: homebrew-mode为内联修补程序提供语法高亮显示，并提供许多用于编辑公式文件的辅助函数。

trans-unit.source: pcmpl-homebrew provides completion for emacs shell-mode and eshell-mode.
trans-unit.target: pcmpl-homebrew为emacs外壳模式和eshell-mode提供完成。

trans-unit.source: homebrew-ffmpeg/ffmpeg: A tap for FFmpeg with additional options, including nonfree additions.
trans-unit.target: homebrew-ffmpeg / ffmpeg：轻按FFmpeg即可使用其他选项，包括非免费添加。

trans-unit.source: homebrew/core supports multiple versions of formulae with a special naming format. For example, the formula for GCC 6 is named gcc@6.rb and begins with class GccAT6 < Formula.
trans-unit.target: homebrew / core支持具有特殊命名格式的多个版本的公式。例如，GCC 6的公式名为 gcc@6.rb ,并且以 class GccAT6 < Formula 开头。

trans-unit.source: lifepillar/appleii: Formulae for vintage Apple emulation.
trans-unit.target: lifepillar / appleii：老式Apple仿真的公式。

trans-unit.source: mistydemeo/tigerbrew: Experimental Tiger PowerPC version.
trans-unit.target: mistydemeo / tigerbrew：Tiger PowerPC实验版本。

trans-unit.source: osrf/simulation: Tools for robotics simulation.
trans-unit.target: osrf / simulation：机器人仿真工具。

trans-unit.source: osx-cross/avr: GNU AVR toolchain (Libc, compilers and other tools for Atmel MCUs, useful for Arduino hackers and AVR programmers).
trans-unit.target: osx-cross / avr：GNU AVR工具链（Libc，Atmel MCU的编译器和其他工具，对Arduino黑客和AVR程序员有用）。

trans-unit.source: petere/postgresql: Allows installing multiple PostgreSQL versions in parallel.
trans-unit.target: petere / postgresql：允许并行安装多个PostgreSQL版本。

trans-unit.source: RISC-V provides the RISC-V toolchain including binutils and GCC.
trans-unit.target: RISC-V提供了RISC-V工具链，包括binutils和GCC。

trans-unit.source: sidaf/pentest: Tools for penetration testing.
trans-unit.target: sidaf / pentest：渗透测试工具。

trans-unit.source: homebrew-pypi-poet can help you generate resource stanzas for the dependencies of your Python application.
trans-unit.target: homebrew-pypi-poet可以帮助您为Python应用程序的依赖项生成 resource 节。

trans-unit.source: titanous/gnuradio: GNU Radio and friends running on macOS.
trans-unit.target: titanous / gnuradio：GNU Radio和在macOS上运行的朋友。

trans-unit.source: varenc/ffmpeg: A tap for FFmpeg with additional options, including nonfree additions.
trans-unit.target: varenc / ffmpeg：FFmpeg的水龙头，带有其他选项，包括非免费添加。

trans-unit.source: brew.vim adds highlighting to inline patches in Vim.
trans-unit.target: brew.vim为Vim中的内联补丁添加了突出显示。

trans-unit.source: PEP 453 makes a recommendation to downstream distributors (us) that sdist tarballs should be installed with pip instead of by invoking setup.py directly. We do not do this because Apple’s Python distribution does not include pip, so we can’t assume that pip is available. We could do something clever to work around Apple’s piplessness but the value proposition is not yet clear.
trans-unit.target: PEP 453向下游发行商（美国）建议，应该使用 pip 安装sdist tarball，而不是直接调用 setup.py 。我们不这样做是因为Apple的Python发行版不包含pip，因此我们不能假定pip可用。我们可以做一些聪明的事情来解决苹果的无网点问题，但价值主张尚不明确。

trans-unit.source: fails_with declarations can be used with any of :gcc, :llvm, and :clang. Homebrew will use this information to select a working compiler (if one is available).
trans-unit.target: fails_with 声明可以与 :gcc ， :llvm 和 :clang 中的任何一个一起使用。Homebrew将使用此信息来选择可以运行的编译器（如果可用）。

trans-unit.source: head URLs (activated by passing --HEAD) build the development cutting edge. Specifying it is easy:
trans-unit.target: head URL（通过传递 --HEAD 激活）构建了开发的前沿。指定起来很容易：

trans-unit.source: option names should be prefixed with the words with or without. For example, an option to run a test suite should be named --with-test or --with-check rather than --test, and an option to enable a shared library --with-shared rather than --shared or --enable-shared.
trans-unit.target: option 名称应 with 或 without 带有单词的前缀。例如，运行测试套件的选项应命名为 --with-test 或 --with-check 而不是 --test ，而启用共享库的选项应命名为 --with-shared 而不是 --shared 或 --enable-shared 。

trans-unit.source: options that aren’t build.with? or build.without? should be deprecated with deprecated_option. See wget for an example.
trans-unit.target: option 不是 build.with? 选项 s？或 build.without? 应该使用 deprecated_option 弃用。有关示例，请参见 wget 。

trans-unit.source: patches can be declared in stable and head blocks. Always use a block instead of a conditional, i.e. stable do ... end instead of if build.stable? then ... end.
trans-unit.target: patch 可以在 stable 块和 head 块中声明patch。始终使用块而不是条件块（即 stable do ... end 来代替 if build.stable? then ... end 。

trans-unit.source: patches can be declared in stable, devel, and head blocks. Always use a block instead of a conditional, i.e. stable do ... end instead of if build.stable? then ... end.
trans-unit.target: patch es可以在 stable ， devel 和 head 块中声明。始终使用块而不是有条件的（即 stable do ... end 而不是 if build.stable? then ... end 。

trans-unit.source: plist_name will return e.g. homebrew.mxcl.<formula>
trans-unit.target: plist_name 将返回例如 homebrew.mxcl.<formula>

trans-unit.source: plist_path will return e.g. /usr/local/Cellar/foo/0.1/homebrew.mxcl.foo.plist
trans-unit.target: plist_path 将返回例如 /usr/local/Cellar/foo/0.1/homebrew.mxcl.foo.plist

trans-unit.source: revisions are also used for formulae that move from the system OpenSSL to the Homebrew-shipped OpenSSL without any other changes to that formula. This ensures users aren’t left exposed to the potential security issues of the outdated OpenSSL. An example of this can be seen in this commit.
trans-unit.target: revision s也用于从系统OpenSSL迁移到自家发行的OpenSSL的公式，而对该公式没有任何其他更改。这样可以确保用户不会暴露于过时的OpenSSL的潜在安全问题。在此commit中可以看到一个示例。

trans-unit.source: inreplace is a convenience function that can edit files in-place. For example:
trans-unit.target: inreplace 是一种便利功能，可以就地编辑文件。例如：

trans-unit.source: inreplace should be used instead of patches when patching something that will never be accepted upstream, e.g. making the software’s build system respect Homebrew’s installation hierarchy. If it’s something that affects both Homebrew and MacPorts (i.e. macOS specific) it should be turned into an upstream submitted patch instead.
trans-unit.target: inreplace 在修补上游永远不会接受的内容时，应使用 inreplace而不是修补程序，例如，使软件的构建系统遵守Homebrew的安装层次结构。如果它同时影响Homebrew和MacPorts（即特定于macOS），则应将其转换为上游提交的补丁。

trans-unit.source: Sorbet’s Documentation is a good place to get started if you want to dive deeper into Sorbet and it’s abilities.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想深入了解Sorbet及其功能，Sorbet的文档资料是一个入门的好地方。

trans-unit.source: Virtualenv ships pip and creates isolated Python environments with separate site-packages, therefore you won’t need sudo.
trans-unit.target: Virtualenv提供 pip 并使用单独的站点包创建隔离的Python环境，因此您不需要sudo。

trans-unit.source: Taps are external sources of Homebrew formulae and/or external commands. They can be created by anyone to provide their own formulae and/or external commands to any Homebrew user.
trans-unit.target: Tap是Homebrew公式和/或外部命令的外部来源。任何人都可以创建它们，以向任何Homebrew用户提供自己的公式和/或外部命令。

trans-unit.source: Taps are external sources of Homebrew formulae, casks and/or external commands. They can be created by anyone to provide their own formulae, casks and/or external commands to any Homebrew user.
trans-unit.target: 龙头是自制啤酒配方，酒桶和/或外部命令的外部来源。任何人都可以创建它们，以向任何Homebrew用户提供自己的配方，桶和/或外部命令。

trans-unit.target: 2建议使用10.12或更高版本。尽力支持10.9–10.11。对于10.4-10.6，请参见 Tigerbrew。

trans-unit.source: 2 10.13 or higher is recommended. 10.9–10.12 are supported on a best-effort basis. For 10.4-10.6 see Tigerbrew.

trans-unit.target: 2建议使用10.14或更高版本。尽力支持10.9–10.13。对于10.4-10.6，请参见Tigerbrew。

trans-unit.source: 3 Most formulae require a compiler. A handful require a full Xcode installation. You can install Xcode, the CLT, or both; Homebrew supports all three configurations. Downloading Xcode may require an Apple Developer account on older versions of Mac OS X. Sign up for free here.
trans-unit.target: 3大多数公式需要编译器。少数需要完整的Xcode安装。您可以安装Xcode和/或CLT；Homebrew支持所有三种配置。下载Xcode可能需要在较旧版本的Mac OS X上使用Apple Developer帐户。在此处免费注册。

trans-unit.source: 4 The one-liner installation method found on brew.sh requires a Bourne-compatible shell (e.g. bash or zsh). Notably, fish, tcsh and csh will not work.
trans-unit.target: 4 brew.sh上的单行安装方法需要兼容Bourne的外壳（例如bash或zsh）。值得注意的是，fish，tcsh和csh将不起作用。

trans-unit.source: --rootis used when installing into a prefix that will not become part of the final installation location of the files, like when building a .rpm or binary distribution. When using a setup.py-based setuptools, --root has the side effect of activating --single-version-externally-managed. It is not safe to use --root with an empty --prefix because the root is removed from paths when byte-compiling modules.
trans-unit.target: --root 在安装到不会成为文件最终安装位置一部分的前缀时使用，例如在构建.rpm或二进制发行版时。当使用 setup.py 基setuptools的， --root 具有激活的副作用 --single-version-externally-managed 。将 --root 与空的 --prefix 一起使用是不安全的，因为在字节编译模块时， root 已从路径中删除。

trans-unit.source: -n, --new-issue: Automatically create a new issue in the appropriate GitHub repository after creating the Gist.
trans-unit.target: -n ， --new-issue new -issue：创建Gist后，在相应的GitHub存储库中自动创建一个新问题。

trans-unit.source: -n, --new-issue: Automatically create a new issue in the appropriate GitHub repository as well as creating the Gist.
trans-unit.target: -n ， --new-issue new -issue：在适当的GitHub存储库中自动创建一个新发行版，并创建Gist。

trans-unit.source: -n: Show dependencies in topological order.
trans-unit.target: -n ：以拓扑顺序显示依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: -n: Sort dependencies in topological order.
trans-unit.target: -n ：按拓扑顺序对依赖项进行排序。

trans-unit.source: -p, --patch: Also output patch from commit.
trans-unit.target: -p ，-- --patch ：还从提交输出补丁。

trans-unit.source: -p, --patch: Also print patch from commit.
trans-unit.target: -p ，-- --patch ：也从提交打印补丁。

trans-unit.source: -p, --print-only: Print the updated resource blocks instead of changing formula.
trans-unit.target: -p ， --print-only print -only：打印更新的资源块，而不是更改 formula 。

trans-unit.source: -p, --private: The Gist will be marked private and will not appear in listings but will be accessible with its link.
trans-unit.target: -p ，-- --private ：要点将被标记为私有，并且不会出现在列表中，但可以通过其链接进行访问。

trans-unit.source: -p, --private: The Gist will be marked private and will not appear in listings but will be accessible with the link.
trans-unit.target: -p ，-- --private ：要点将被标记为私有，并且不会出现在列表中，但是可以通过链接访问。

trans-unit.source: -q, --quiet: List only the names of commands without category headers.
trans-unit.target: -q ，-- --quiet ：仅列出没有类别标题的命令名称。

trans-unit.source: -q, --quiet: List only the names of outdated kegs (takes precedence over --verbose).
trans-unit.target: -q ，-- --quiet ：仅列出过时的小桶的名称（优先于 --verbose ）。

trans-unit.source: -q, --quiet: Make some output more quiet.
trans-unit.target: -q ， --quiet ：请一些输出更安静。

trans-unit.source: -q, --quiet: Silence all non-critical errors.
trans-unit.target: -q ，-- --quiet ：使所有非关键错误都静音。

trans-unit.source: -q, --quiet: Suppress any warnings.
trans-unit.target: -q ，-- --quiet ：禁止显示任何警告。

trans-unit.source: -q, --quiet: Suppress warnings, don’t print a progress bar for JSON output.
trans-unit.target: -q ，-- --quiet ：禁止警告，不要为JSON输出打印进度条。

trans-unit.source: -q, --quieter: Suppress any warnings.
trans-unit.target: -q ，-- --quieter ：禁止显示任何警告。

trans-unit.source: -r: Load a library using require.
trans-unit.target: -r ：使用 require 加载库。

trans-unit.source: -r: Reverse the order of the formulae sort to list the oldest entries first.
trans-unit.target: -r ：颠倒公式排序的顺序，以首先列出最早的条目。

trans-unit.source: -r: Reverse the order of the sort to get the oldest entries first.
trans-unit.target: -r ：颠倒排序顺序以首先获取最早的条目。

trans-unit.source: -s, --build-from-source: Compile formula from source even if a bottle is available.
trans-unit.target: -s ，-- --build-from-source ：即使有瓶也可以从源代码编译 formula 。

trans-unit.source: -s, --build-from-source: Compile formula from source even if a bottle is provided. Dependencies will still be installed from bottles if they are available.
trans-unit.target: -s ，-- --build-from-source ：即使提供了瓶子，也可以从源代码编译 formula 。如果有依赖关系，将仍然从瓶子中安装依赖项。

trans-unit.source: -s, --build-from-source: Compile the specified formula from source even if a bottle is provided. Dependencies will still be installed from bottles if they are available.
trans-unit.target: -s ，-- --build-from-source ：即使提供了瓶子，也可以从源代码编译指定的 formula 。如果有依赖关系，将仍然从瓶子中安装依赖项。

trans-unit.source: -s, --build-from-source: Download source packages rather than a bottle.
trans-unit.target: -s ，-- --build-from-source ：下载源软件包而不是瓶子。

trans-unit.source: -s, --build-from-source: Download the source for rather than a bottle.
trans-unit.target: -s ，-- --build-from-source ：下载源代码而不是瓶子。

trans-unit.source: -s, --build-from-source: Show the cache file used when building from source.
trans-unit.target: -s ，-- --build-from-source ：显示从源构建时使用的缓存文件。

trans-unit.source: -s, --search: Search both name and description for provided text. If text is flanked by slashes, it is interpreted as a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -s ，-- --search ：在名称和描述中搜索提供的 text 。如果 text 两侧带有斜杠，则将其解释为正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: -s, --search: Search both names and descriptions for text. If text is flanked by slashes, it is interpreted as a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -s ，-- --search ：在名称和描述中搜索 text 。如果 text 两侧带有斜杠，则将其解释为正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: -s, --silent: Suppress any output.
trans-unit.target: -s ，-- --silent ：禁止任何输出。

trans-unit.source: -s: Scrub the cache, including downloads for even the latest versions. Note downloads for any installed formula or cask will still not be deleted. If you want to delete those too: rm -rf "$(brew --cache)"
trans-unit.target: -s ：清除缓存，包括最新版本的下载。注意对于任何已安装的公式或酒桶的下载仍不会被删除。如果您也要删除它们： rm -rf "$(brew --cache)"

trans-unit.source: -s: Scrub the cache, including downloads for even the latest versions. Note downloads for any installed formulae or casks will still not be deleted. If you want to delete those too: rm -rf "$(brew --cache)"
trans-unit.target: -s ：清除缓存，包括最新版本的下载。注意对于任何已安装的公式或酒桶的下载仍不会被删除。如果您也要删除它们： rm -rf "$(brew --cache)"

trans-unit.source: -t: Sort by time modified (most recently modified first).
trans-unit.target: -t ：按修改时间排序（最近修改的优先）。

trans-unit.source: -t: Sort formulae by time modified, listing most recently modified first.
trans-unit.target: -t ：按修改时间对公式排序，首先列出最近修改的公式。

trans-unit.source: -v, --verbose: install prints output from commands as they are run. check lists all missing dependencies.
trans-unit.target: -v ，-- --verbose ： install 在运行命令时输出命令的输出。 check 列出所有缺少的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: -v, --verbose: Do a verbose VCS checkout, if the URL represents a VCS. This is useful for seeing if an existing VCS cache has been updated.
trans-unit.target: -v ， --verbose ：做一个详细的VCS结账，如果URL表示VCS。这对于查看现有的VCS缓存是否已更新非常有用。

trans-unit.source: -v, --verbose: Include detailed version information.
trans-unit.target: -v ，-- --verbose ：包括详细的版本信息。

trans-unit.source: -v, --verbose: Make some output more verbose.
trans-unit.target: -v ， --verbose ：请一些输出更详细。

trans-unit.source: -v, --verbose: Print test step output in real time. Has the side effect of passing output as raw bytes instead of re-encoding in UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: -v ，-- --verbose ：实时打印测试步骤输出。具有将输出作为原始字节传递而不是在UTF-8中重新编码的副作用。

trans-unit.source: -v, --verbose: Print the verification and postinstall steps.
trans-unit.target: -v ，-- --verbose ：打印验证和安装后的步骤。

trans-unit.source: -v, --verbose: Show more verbose analytics data for formula.
trans-unit.target: -v ， --verbose ：显示更详细的用于分析数据 formula 。

trans-unit.source: /sw and /opt/local because build scripts get confused when Homebrew is there instead of Fink or MacPorts, respectively.
trans-unit.target: /sw 和 /opt/local ,因为当Homebrew而不是Fink或MacPorts出现时，构建脚本会变得混乱。

trans-unit.source: /tmp subdirectories because Homebrew gets upset.
trans-unit.target: /tmp 子目录，因为Homebrew不高兴。

trans-unit.source: /usr/local/bin is already in your PATH.
trans-unit.target: /usr/local/bin 已经在您的 PATH 中。

trans-unit.source: :build means that dependency is a build-time only dependency so it can be skipped when installing from a bottle or when listing missing dependencies using brew missing.
trans-unit.target: :build 表示依赖项是仅构建时的依赖项，因此从瓶子安装或使用 brew missing 列出缺少的依赖项时可以跳过。

trans-unit.source: :deprecated_upstream: the project is deprecated upstream
trans-unit.target: :deprecated_upstream ：上游不推荐使用该项目

trans-unit.source: :does_not_build: the formula cannot be built from source
trans-unit.target: :does_not_build ：无法从源代码构建公式

trans-unit.source: :no_license: the formula does not have a license
trans-unit.target: :no_license ：该公式没有许可证

trans-unit.source: :optional generates an implicit with-foo option for the formula. This means that, given depends_on "foo" => :optional, the user must pass --with-foo in order to use the dependency.
trans-unit.target: :optional 为公式生成一个隐式的 with-foo 选项。这意味着，给定 depends_on "foo" => :optional ，用户必须传递 --with-foo 才能使用依赖项。

trans-unit.source: :recommended generates an implicit without-foo option, meaning that the dependency is enabled by default and the user must pass --without-foo to disable this dependency. The default description can be overridden using the normal option syntax (in this case, the option declaration must precede the dependency):
trans-unit.target: :recommended 生成一个隐式的 without-foo 选项，这意味着默认情况下启用了依赖关系，并且用户必须传递 --without-foo 来禁用此依赖关系。可以使用普通的选项语法覆盖默认描述（在这种情况下，选项声明必须在依赖项之前）：

trans-unit.source: :repo_archived: the upstream repository has been archived
trans-unit.target: :repo_archived ：上游仓库已经被存档

trans-unit.source: :repo_removed: the upstream repository has been removed
trans-unit.target: :repo_removed ：上游存储库已被删除

trans-unit.source: :test means that dependency is only required when running brew test.
trans-unit.target: :test 表示仅在运行 brew test 时才需要依赖项。

trans-unit.source: :unmaintained: the project appears to be abandoned
trans-unit.target: :unmaintained ：该项目似乎已被放弃

trans-unit.source: :unsupported: Homebrew’s application of the software is not supported by the upstream developers (e.g. upstream only supports macOS versions prior to 10.14)
trans-unit.target: :unsupported ：上游开发人员不支持该软件的自制软件（例如，上游仅支持10.14之前的macOS版本）

trans-unit.source: :using value
trans-unit.target: :using 使用价值

trans-unit.source: :versioned_formula: the formula is a versioned formula
trans-unit.target: :versioned_formula ：该公式是版本化的公式

trans-unit.source: Gitstrategy block
trans-unit.target: Git strategy 块

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_ARCH: Linux only: If set, Homebrew will pass the set value to type name to the compiler’s -march option instead of using the default (-march=native).
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_ARCH ：仅Linux：如果设置，Homebrew会将设置名称类型的值传递给编译器的 -march 选项，而不是使用默认值（ -march=native ）。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_ARTIFACT_DOMAIN: If set, instructs Homebrew to prefix all download URLs, including those for bottles, with this variable. For example, HOMEBREW_ARTIFACT_DOMAIN=http://localhost:8080 will cause a formula with the URL https://example.com/foo.tar.gz to instead download from http://localhost:8080/example.com/foo.tar.gz.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_ARTIFACT_DOMAIN ：如果设置，则指示Homebrew使用此变量为所有下载URL（包括瓶子的URL）添加前缀。例如， HOMEBREW_ARTIFACT_DOMAIN=http://localhost:8080 将导致URL为 https://example.com/foo.tar.gz 的公式改为从 http://localhost:8080/example.com/foo.tar.gz 。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_AUTO_UPDATE_SECS: If set, Homebrew will only check for autoupdates once per this seconds interval.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_AUTO_UPDATE_SECS ：如果设置，Homebrew将仅在此秒间隔内检查一次自动更新。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID, HOMEBREW_AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY: When using the S3 download strategy, Homebrew will look in these variables for access credentials (see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/userguide/cli-chap-getting-started.html#cli-environment to retrieve these access credentials from AWS). If they are not set, the S3 download strategy will download with a public (unsigned) URL.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID ， HOMEBREW_AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY ：使用 S3 下载策略时，Homebrew将在这些变量中查找访问凭证（请参阅https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/userguide/cli-chap-getting-started.html# cli环境以从AWS检索这些访问凭证）。如果未设置，则 S3 下载策略将使用公共（未签名）URL下载。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN: By default, Homebrew uses https://homebrew.bintray.com/ as its download mirror for bottles. If set, instructs Homebrew to instead use the specified URL. For example, HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN=http://localhost:8080 will cause all bottles to download from the prefix http://localhost:8080/.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN ：默认情况下，Homebrew使用 https://homebrew.bintray.com/ 作为其瓶子的下载镜像。如果设置，则指示Homebrew改用指定的URL。例如， HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN=http://localhost:8080 将导致所有瓶子从前缀 http://localhost:8080/ 。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_BROWSER: If set, Homebrew uses this setting as the browser when opening project homepages, instead of the OS default browser.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_BROWSER ：如果设置，Homebrew在打开项目主页时将使用此设置作为浏览器，而不是OS默认浏览器。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_CACHE: If set, instructs Homebrew to use the specified directory as the download cache.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_CACHE ：如果设置，则指示Homebrew使用指定的目录作为下载缓存。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_CURLRC: If set, Homebrew will not pass -q when invoking curl(1) (which disables the use of curlrc).
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_CURLRC ：如果设置，则在调用 curl （1）时Homebrew将不会通过 -q （这将禁用 curlrc 的使用）。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_CURL_RETRIES: If set, Homebrew will pass the given retry count to --retry when invoking curl(1).
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_CURL_RETRIES ：如果设置，家酿将通过给定的重试次数 --retry 调用时 curl （1）。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_CURL_VERBOSE: If set, Homebrew will pass --verbose when invoking curl(1).
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_CURL_VERBOSE ：如果设置，则在调用 curl （1）时Homebrew将通过 --verbose 。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_DEBUG: If set, any commands that can emit debugging information will do so.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_DEBUG ：如果设置，则任何可以发出调试信息的命令都会这样做。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_DEVELOPER: If set, Homebrew will tweak behaviour to be more relevant for Homebrew developers (active or budding), e.g. turning warnings into errors.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_DEVELOPER ：如果设置，Homebrew将调整行为，使其与Homebrew开发人员（活动或萌芽）更加相关，例如将警告变为错误。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_DISPLAY: If set, Homebrew will use this X11 display when opening a page in a browser, for example with brew home. Primarily useful on Linux.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_DISPLAY ：如果设置，Homebrew在浏览器（例如 brew home 打开页面时将使用此X11显示。在Linux上主要有用。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_DISPLAY_INSTALL_TIMES: If set, Homebrew will print install times for each formula at the end of the run.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_DISPLAY_INSTALL_TIMES ：如果设置，Homebrew将在运行结束时为每个公式打印安装时间。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_EDITOR: If set, Homebrew will use this editor when editing a single formula, or several formulae in the same directory.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_EDITOR ：如果设置，Homebrew将在编辑单个公式或同一目录中的多个公式时使用此编辑器。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_FORBIDDEN_LICENSES can also forbid future versions of specific licenses. For example, to forbid Artistic-1.0, Artistic-2.0 and any future Artistic licenses, use:
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_FORBIDDEN_LICENSES 还可以禁止特定许可证的将来版本。例如，要禁止 Artistic-1.0 ， Artistic-2.0 和任何将来的Artistic许可，请使用：

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_FORCE_BREWED_CURL: If set, Homebrew will always use a Homebrew-installed curl rather than the system version. Automatically set if the system version of curl is too old.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_FORCE_BREWED_CURL ：如果设置，Homebrew将始终使用Homebrew安装的 curl ,而不是系统版本。如果 curl 的系统版本太旧，则自动设置。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_FORCE_BREWED_GIT: If set, Homebrew will always use a Homebrew-installed git rather than the system version. Automatically set if the system version of git is too old.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_FORCE_BREWED_GIT ：如果设置，Homebrew将始终使用Homebrew安装的 git 而不是系统版本。如果 git 的系统版本太旧，则自动设置。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_FORCE_VENDOR_RUBY: If set, Homebrew will always use its vendored, relocatable Ruby version even if the system version of Ruby is new enough.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_FORCE_VENDOR_RUBY ：如果设置，Homebrew将始终使用其可供应的，可重定位的Ruby版本，即使Ruby的系统版本足够新。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_GITHUB_API_TOKEN: A personal access token for the GitHub API, used by Homebrew for features such as brew search. You can create one at https://github.com/settings/tokens. If set, GitHub will allow you a greater number of API requests. For more information, see: https://developer.github.com/v3/#rate-limiting
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_GITHUB_API_TOKEN ：GitHub API的个人访问令牌，由Homebrew用来实现 brew search 之类的功能。您可以在https://github.com/settings/tokens创建一个。如果设置，GitHub将允许您更多的API请求。有关更多信息，请参见：https : //developer.github.com/v3/#rate-limiting

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_INSTALL_BADGE: Text printed before the installation summary of each successful build.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_INSTALL_BADGE ：在每个成功构建的安装摘要之前打印的文本。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_LOGS: If set, Homebrew will use the specified directory to store log files.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_LOGS ：如果设置，Homebrew将使用指定的目录来存储日志文件。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_MAKE_JOBS: If set, instructs Homebrew to use the value of HOMEBREW_MAKE_JOBS as the number of parallel jobs to run when building with make(1).
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_MAKE_JOBS ：如果设置，则指示Homebrew使用 HOMEBREW_MAKE_JOBS 的值作为使用 make （1）进行构建时要运行的并行作业的数量。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_NO_ANALYTICS: If set, Homebrew will not send analytics. See: https://docs.brew.sh/Analytics
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_NO_ANALYTICS ：如果设置，Homebrew将不发送分析。请参阅：https：//docs.brew.sh/Analytics

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE: If set, Homebrew will not auto-update before running brew install, brew upgrade or brew tap.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE ：如果设置，Homebrew在运行 brew install ， brew upgrade 或 brew tap 之前不会自动更新。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_NO_BOTTLE_SOURCE_FALLBACK: If set, Homebrew will fail on the failure of installation from a bottle rather than falling back to building from source.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_NO_BOTTLE_SOURCE_FALLBACK ：如果设置，Homebrew将在无法从瓶子安装的情况下失败，而不是从源头退回到构建。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_NO_COLOR: If set, Homebrew will not print text with colour added.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_NO_COLOR ：如果设置，Homebrew将不会打印添加颜色的文本。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_NO_EMOJI: If set, Homebrew will not print the HOMEBREW_INSTALL_BADGE on a successful build.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_NO_EMOJI ：如果设置，Homebrew将不会在成功的构建中打印 HOMEBREW_INSTALL_BADGE 。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_NO_GITHUB_API: If set, Homebrew will not use the GitHub API, e.g. for searches or fetching relevant issues on a failed install.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_NO_GITHUB_API ：如果设置，Homebrew将不使用GitHub API，例如用于搜索或在安装失败时获取相关问题。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT: If set, Homebrew will not permit redirects from secure HTTPS to insecure HTTP.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT ：如果设置，Homebrew将不允许从安全HTTPS重定向到不安全HTTP。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_NO_INSTALL_CLEANUP: If set, brew install, brew upgrade and brew reinstall will never automatically cleanup the installed/upgraded/reinstalled formulae or all formulae every 30 days.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_NO_INSTALL_CLEANUP ：如果设置，则 brew install ， brew upgrade 和 brew reinstall 将永远不会每30天自动清理一次已安装/已升级/已重新安装的公式或所有公式。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_PREFIX, HOMEBREW_CELLAR and HOMEBREW_REPOSITORY are also exported to save multiple queries of those variables.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_PREFIX 还导出HOMEBREW_PREFIX， HOMEBREW_CELLAR 和 HOMEBREW_REPOSITORY 以保存这些变量的多个查询。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_PRY: If set, Homebrew will use Pry for the brew irb command.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_PRY ：如果设置，Homebrew将使用Pry作为 brew irb 命令。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_SVN: When exporting from Subversion, Homebrew will use HOMEBREW_SVN if set, a Homebrew-built Subversion if installed, or the system-provided binary.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_SVN ：从Subversion导出时，Homebrew将使用 HOMEBREW_SVN (如果已设置），Homebrew内置的Subversion（如果已安装）或系统提供的二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_TEMP: If set, instructs Homebrew to use HOMEBREW_TEMP as the temporary directory for building packages. This may be needed if your system temp directory and Homebrew prefix are on different volumes, as macOS has trouble moving symlinks across volumes when the target does not yet exist.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_TEMP ：如果设置，则指示Homebrew将 HOMEBREW_TEMP 用作构建软件包的临时目录。如果您的系统临时目录和Homebrew前缀位于不同的卷上，则可能需要这样做，因为当目标尚不存在时，macOS在跨卷移动符号链接时会遇到麻烦。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_UPDATE_TO_TAG: If set, instructs Homebrew to always use the latest stable tag (even if developer commands have been run).
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_UPDATE_TO_TAG ：如果设置，则指示Homebrew始终使用最新的稳定标记（即使已运行开发人员命令）。

trans-unit.source: HOMEBREW_VERBOSE: If set, Homebrew always assumes --verbose when running commands.
trans-unit.target: HOMEBREW_VERBOSE ：如果设置，运行命令时，Homebrew始终假定 --verbose 。

trans-unit.source: brew bundle will output a Brewfile.lock.json in the same directory as the Brewfile if all dependencies are installed successfully. This contains dependency and system status information which can be useful in debugging brew bundle failures and replicating a “last known good build” state. You can opt-out of this behaviour by setting the HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_NO_LOCK environment variable or passing the --no-lock option. You may wish to check this file into the same version control system as your Brewfile (or ensure your version control system ignores it if you’d prefer to rely on debugging information from a local machine).
trans-unit.target: brew bundle 将输出 Brewfile.lock.json 在同一目录中 Brewfile 如果所有依赖安装成功。其中包含相关性和系统状态信息，这些信息可用于调试 brew bundle 故障和复制“最后一次正确的构建”状态。您可以通过设置 HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_NO_LOCK 环境变量或传递 --no-lock 选项来退出此行为。您可能希望将此文件检入到与 Brewfile 相同的版本控制系统中（或者，如果您希望依靠本地计算机上的调试信息，请确保版本控制系统将其忽略）。

trans-unit.source: brew link --force creates a warning in brew doctor to let both you and maintainers know that a link exists that could be causing issues. If you’ve linked something and there’s no problems at all? Feel free to ignore the brew doctor error.
trans-unit.target: brew link --force 在 brew doctor 创建警告，让您和维护人员都知道存在可能导致问题的链接。如果您已链接了某件东西，那根本没有问题吗？随意忽略 brew doctor 错误。

trans-unit.source: brew tap <user/repo> <URL> makes a clone of the repository at URL. Unlike the one-argument version, URL is not assumed to be GitHub, and it doesn’t have to be HTTP. Any location and any protocol that Git can handle is fine.
trans-unit.target: brew tap <user/repo> <URL> 仓库> <URL>在URL处克隆存储库。与单参数版本不同，URL不假定为GitHub，也不必假定为HTTP。Git可以处理的任何位置和协议都可以。

trans-unit.source: brew tap <user/repo> <URL> makes a shallow clone of the repository at URL. Unlike the one-argument version, URL is not assumed to be GitHub, and it doesn’t have to be HTTP. Any location and any protocol that Git can handle is fine.
trans-unit.target: brew tap <user/repo> <URL> 仓库> <URL>在URL处对存储库进行浅表克隆。与单参数版本不同，URL不假定为GitHub，也不必假定为HTTP。Git可以处理的任何位置和协议都可以。

trans-unit.source: brew tap <user/repo> makes a clone of the repository at https://github.com/user/homebrew-repo. After that, brew will be able to work on those formulae as if they were in Homebrew’s canonical repository. You can install and uninstall them with brew [un]install, and the formulae are automatically updated when you run brew update. (See below for details about how brew tap handles the names of repositories.)
trans-unit.target: brew tap <user/repo> 在https://github.com/user/homebrew-repo上克隆存储库。之后， brew 将能够处理这些公式，就像它们在Homebrew的规范存储库中一样。您可以使用 brew [un]install 来安装和卸载它们，并且在运行 brew update 时，公式会自动更新。（有关 brew tap 如何处理存储库名称的详细信息，请参见下文。）

trans-unit.source: brew tap <user/repo> makes a shallow clone of the repository at https://github.com/user/repo. After that, brew will be able to work on those formulae as if they were in Homebrew’s canonical repository. You can install and uninstall them with brew [un]install, and the formulae are automatically updated when you run brew update. (See below for details about how brew tap handles the names of repositories.)
trans-unit.target: brew tap <user/repo> 在https://github.com/user/repo上对存储库进行了浅表克隆。之后， brew 将能够处理这些公式，就像它们在Homebrew的规范存储库中一样。您可以使用 brew [un]install 安装和卸载它们，并且在运行 brew update 时会自动更新公式。（有关 brew tap 如何处理存储库名称的详细信息，请参见下文。）

trans-unit.source: brew tap --repair migrates tapped formulae from a symlink-based to directory-based structure. (This should only need to be run once.)
trans-unit.target: brew tap --repair 将窃听的公式从基于符号链接的结构迁移到基于目录的结构。（这只需要运行一次。）

trans-unit.source: brew tap adds more repositories to the list of formulae that brew tracks, updates, and installs from. By default, tap assumes that the repositories come from GitHub, but the command isn’t limited to any one location.
trans-unit.target: brew tap 将更多存储库添加到 brew 跟踪，更新和安装的公式列表中。默认情况下， tap 假定存储库来自GitHub，但是命令不限于任何一个位置。

trans-unit.target: brew test-bot 是由我们的Kickstarter在2013年资助的自动审查和测试系统的名称。

trans-unit.source: brew untap user/repo [user/repo user/repo ...] removes the given taps. The repositories are deleted and brew will no longer be aware of their formulae. brew untap can handle multiple removals at once.
trans-unit.target: brew untap user/repo [user/repo user/repo ...] 删除给定的水龙头。存储库将被删除，并且 brew 将不再知道其配方。 brew untap 可以一次处理多个清除操作。

trans-unit.source: superenv is our “super environment” that isolates builds by removing /usr/local/bin and all user PATHs that are not essential for the build. It does this because user PATHs are often full of stuff that breaks builds. superenv also removes bad flags from the commands passed to clang/gcc and injects others (for example all keg_only dependencies are added to the -I and -L flags).
trans-unit.target: superenv 是我们的“超级环境”，它通过删除 /usr/local/bin 和所有对于构建不是必需的用户 PATH 来隔离构建。这样做是因为用户 PATH 通常充满了破坏构建的内容。 superenv 还会从传递给 clang / gcc 的命令中删除错误标志，并注入其他标志（例如，所有 keg_only 依赖项都添加到 -I 和 -L 标志中）。

trans-unit.source: Always leave system-wide protection enabled, and disable it only for specific apps as needed.
trans-unit.target: 始终使系统范围的保护处于启用状态，并仅根据需要对特定的应用程序禁用它。

trans-unit.source: Anchor the start/end of the regex, to restrict the scope. For example, on HTML pages we often match file names or version directories in href attribute URLs (e.g. /href=.*?example[._-]v?(\d+(?:\.\d+)+)\.zip/i). The general idea is that limiting scope will help exclude unwanted matches.
trans-unit.target: 锚定正则表达式的开始/结束，以限制范围。例如，在HTML页面上，我们经常在 href 属性URL中匹配文件名或版本目录（例如 /href=.*?example[._-]v?(\d+(?:\.\d+)+)\.zip/i ）。一般的想法是，限制范围将有助于排除不必要的匹配。

trans-unit.source: Avoid checking paginated release pages, when possible. For example, we generally avoid checking the release page for a GitHub project because the latest stable version can be pushed off the first page by pre-release versions. In this scenario, it’s more reliable to use the Git strategy, which fetches all the tags in the repository.
trans-unit.target: 尽可能避免查看分页的发行页面。例如，我们通常避免检查GitHub项目的 release 页面，因为最新的稳定版本可以通过预发布版本从首页推下。在这种情况下，使用 Git 策略更为可靠，该策略将获取存储库中的所有标签。

trans-unit.source: Avoid generic catch-alls like .* or .+ in favor of something non-greedy and/or contextually appropriate. For example, to match characters within the bounds of an HTML attribute, use [^"' >]+?.
trans-unit.target: 避免使用通用的包罗万象的东西，例如 .* 或 .+ 以偏爱非贪婪和/或上下文相关的事物。例如，一个HTML属性，使用的范围内相匹配的字符 [^"' >]+? 。

trans-unit.source: However, all versions of RubyGems before 1.3.6 are buggy and ignore the above setting. Sadly a fresh install of Snow Leopard comes with 1.3.5. Currently the only known way to get around this is to upgrade rubygems as root:

trans-unit.source: If you plan to install gems that depend on brews then save yourself a bunch of hassle and install to /usr/local!

trans-unit.source: If you plan to install gems that depend on formulae then save yourself a bunch of hassle and install to /usr/local!
trans-unit.target: 如果您打算安装依赖于公式的gems，那么可以省去一堆麻烦并安装到 /usr/local ！

trans-unit.source: If you use rbenv or RVM then you should ignore this stuff
trans-unit.target: 如果使用rbenv或RVM，则应忽略此内容

trans-unit.source: If you’ve upgraded to 10.9 or later from an earlier version: Because the default C++ standard library is now libc++, you may not be able to build software using dependencies that you built on 10.8 or earlier. If you’re reading this page because you were directed here by a build error, you can most likely fix the issue if you reinstall all the dependencies of the package you’re trying to build.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已从早期版本升级到10.9或更高版本：由于默认的C ++标准库现在是libc ++，因此您可能无法使用在10.8或更早版本上构建的依赖项来构建软件。如果您是由于构建错误而被引导到此页面的，那么，如果您重新安装要构建的软件包的所有依赖项，则很可能可以解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: Important: If you choose to install a Python which isn’t either of these two (system Python or brewed Python), the Homebrew team cannot support any breakage that may occur.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：如果您选择安装的Python既不是这两种Python（系统Python也不是Brewed Python），那么Homebrew团队将无法支持可能发生的任何损坏。

trans-unit.source: Important: If you choose to use a Python which isn’t either of these two (system Python or brewed Python), the Homebrew team cannot support any breakage that may occur.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：如果您选择使用这两者中的任何一个都不是Python（系统Python或酿造的Python），那么Homebrew团队将无法支持可能发生的任何损坏。

trans-unit.source: Important:$(brew --prefix)/bin is NOT on the PATH during formula installation. If you have dependencies at build time, you must specify them and brew will add them to the PATH or create a Requirement.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示： $(brew --prefix)/bin 未在 PATH 式安装过程中。如果在构建时具有依赖项，则必须指定它们，并且 brew 将其添加到 PATH 或创建 Requirement 。

trans-unit.source: Important: Python may be upgraded to a newer version at any time. Consider using a version manager such as pyenv if you require stability of minor or patch versions for virtual environments.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：Python可以随时升级到较新的版本。如果您需要虚拟环境的次要版本或补丁版本的稳定性，请考虑使用诸如 pyenv 之类的版本管理器。
